setEffects.2: Increases DMG dealt to enemies with debuffs by {{1, percent}}%.
setEffects.4: Increases CRIT Rate by {{1, percent}}%. The wearer deals {{2, percent}}%/{{3, percent}}% increased CRIT DMG to enemies with at least {{4}}/{{5}} debuffs. After the wearer inflicts a debuff on enemy targets, the aforementioned effects increase by 100%, lasting for {{6}} turn(s).
